yamak swabhawikayi nam eya aarthika/samaja kramayen kramayata wenas wenna baha.sruthu bhedaya wadawasam yugayedi eka widihakatath dhanawadi yugaye wenath widihakatath kriyathmaka wenne naha.wadawasam yugaye ira nagenahirin nagala,nuthana yugayedi batahirin naginneth-yam heyakin dhanawadi yugaya wenath yugayak bawata minisa wisin wenas karana ladahoth dakunin payannata patan ganneth naha.yamak samaja kramayata/yugayata sapekshawa wenas wenawa nam ethaninma pahadili wenne eya swabhawika ekak nowa samajayiya nirmithayak bawayi.me anuwa pin pawu(chethanwitha yahapatha/ayahapatha) yanu wishwiya dharmathawayak ho niyamayak nemeyi minisage swayan nirmanayak yanna pahadiliyi.

mehidi apa danna deyak thamayi me wayasedi thamayi daruwage kayika wenaswim bohomayak sidu wanne , gahanu daruwakuge aarthawa chakraya sakriya wima , pirimi daruwakuge lingika awayawa wala wiwidha wenaswim siduwima , me thaththwayedi daruwan thama sama kandayam ekka thama thamange athdakim beda gannawa, eeka wadagath , eeth ee kuthuhalaya waradi dishawakata yamata ada samajaye pelambaawim bohomayi , ithin niwaradi danumak nathi me daru patawunta thama kuthuhalaya wisada ganimata niwaradi danuwath kirimak nowimath meyata hethuwak , wisheshayenma mehidi ‚Äúmama‚Äú wadagath bhumikawak itu kala yuthu yayi mama hithanawa , ese nowana awasthawaka daruwata ‚Äúnawatha niwaradi kala nohaki waradak ‚Äú siduwimata ida wadiyi

me singithiyanta aththe ek hruda wasthuwak ha ek akmawak pamanaki.pasugiya 13 wanida rathri ekolahata aasannawa thibiyadi me wishesha debidi daru upath sandaha siseriyan sathkama sidu kara thibena athara daru dedena dan sitinne rohal wishesha ladaru anshayeya.lama roga wisheshagnyayange parikshawata da me daru dedena yomukara thibena athara mowun ada hetama da soyisa kantha rohalen boralle rijwe lama rohal wishesha sathkara anshayak wetha maru kirimatath ehidi daruwan pilibanda wadidura parikshana pawathwa sidukala haki waidya sewawan pilibandawa thiranaya kerenu atha.upadina wita daru dedena kilogram 3.455 k pamana wiya.ek hadawathak ha ek akmawak pamanak thibena bawin daru dedena wen kirime sathkama ape rate sidu kirima athishaya dushkara karyayak bawa da waidya ruwan pathirana mahatha pawasayi.atham wita singappuruwa wani rataka mewani daruwan wenkara ganimata sathkam pahasukam thibiya haki namuth ewani sathkamak wuwada athishaya sankirna ha bararum sathkamak wiya haki bawa da hethema wadiduratath penwa dunneya.alutha upan me daruwanta danma sathkama kirimata apahasutha mathu wanne owunge sharirawala le sansaranaya itha sulu pramanayakin pamanak siduwima nisaya.bararum sathkamak sidu kirimata rudhiraya sahena pramanayak da awashyaya.mewani sathkamakata lankawe nam shalya waidyawaru wadi sankhyawak da sitiya yuthu athara dina dekaka tharam kalayak saha dadi prayathnayak da me sandaha dariya yuthuya.daru upath lakshayakata debidi daru upathak samanyayen siduwiya hakiya.
eya labhadayi wanawa pamanak nowa, owunge iriyawwa wadidiyunu kirimata minisunta upakara kala haki wishishta nishpadanayak we.
ee anuwa, ehi prathipalayak lesa awasanayedi wipakshaya thunakata kadi yayi.
bahuthara adahasa anuwa ihalagama, pahalagama, madagama, aluthgama saha pattiyagama lesa eewa hadinweyi.
